channel.title: Munin on Julien Pivotto

item.title: Munin 2 "not a reference" error
item.description: This morning I worked with Munin, discovering that Munin 2 has made it to EPEL. Thus I started to look at puppet modules. I tried two of them (ssm-munin and duritong-munin), and no one seemed to be working. I was then digging deeper about what the problem could be, so I logged in to the machine with the munin user: ::text # su - munin --shell=/bin/bash Then I ran the script by hand:
